# Bemly_
### A curious soul from China üá®üá≥ seeking innovation, hindered by own technical constraints.

$$
\text{Growth} = \lim_{\text{time} \to \infty} (\text{learning} \times \text{change})
$$

$$
\text{Cat} + \text{Creeper} \rightarrow \text{Curiosity} \dagger
$$

- üëë A code enthusiast driven by *consuming passion*
- üïπ **Inspired By Minecraft!** No regrets entering the world of Minecraft, in the next life, I‚Äôd love to be a blocky character again.

- üîû A OTAKU who likes loli, shota, yuri and so on, this is the Utopia for MINE!
